title: Sloppy Cheesesteak Sliders
directions: In a large skillet over medium heat cook, garlic and half of onion until softened, 2 minutes. Stir in Worcestershire sauce, chili powder, dry mustard, and brown sugar. Increase heat to medium-high; brown beef with garlic mixture, about 5 minutes. Add crushed tomatoes until warmed through, about 2 minutes.

Meanwhile cut kaiser rolls in half and place on serving plates. Turn off heat and mix in cheese with sloppy joe mixture. Divide between the 4 rolls. Top with a dollop of guacamole, arugula, cherry tomatoes, remaining red onion, and pickles.
